title: Bauhaus Chicago: Design in the City
short_description: Part of the global celebration of the Bauhaus centenary, this exhibition presents jewelry, photography, textiles, furniture, monumental sculpture, and urban planning that reflect the unique Chicago translation of Bauhaus aesthetic and principles.
